Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}
{3: 'Summer is already coming to an end, but it feels just as hot and humid, like the special phenomenon named "second summer" in some Golden Age text.'}
{3: 'But such weather should never occur in Babylonia. The truth is, an accidental breakdown of the air conditioning system has brought summer to everybody.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "This—is—so—hot! Can't we find a cooler place?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "I've had enough! The temperature is over the limit of the auto circulation system. My brain module is going to break down!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'So why are you here...?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Because Capt just turned off the air conditioner in Strike Hawk\'s preparation room. He said, "we must save energy in such a situation..."', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "He must be bloody kidding! The Engineering Force's workshop is going over 65°C. Who's going to stay there?!", 4: '1'}
{2: "So it's the air conditioner, huh...", 3: '22', 4: 'When can they fix it...?', 5: '16'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Huh? I've no idea. Team One went to the central control room with all the heat-insulating equipment. Haven't heard from them since then.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Don't you have to go?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Why would I? It's Team One's job.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Don't worry about her. Do you have ice-cream here? Do you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'I heard the President brought the ice-cream machine from Venus Splash Park!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Oh, that machine... Miss Celica put it in the warehouse, didn't she?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Yeah, Babylonia doesn't have the extra energy for ice cream at this time.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Isn't that obvious...?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Fine. Lee's so boring. Better play my games!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Kamui helps himself to the game controllers under the coffee table, and turns on the giant screen in the preparation room.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Everybody looks so restless...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'How about I ask Miss Celica for some low-temperature buffering liquid to cool you down?', 4: '2'}
{3: '—The door is pushed open.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Huh? Why are you all here?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'It is Ayla, followed by a few Constructs from the WGAA.'}
{3: 'They are trying to pull a large "box" into the room. It looks like a console.'}
{2: 'Why are you here?', 3: '50', 4: "What's this thing?", 5: '53'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Ah, I need your help—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'The Archaeological Team found this thing, but nobody knew how to crack it. Then I remembered your excellent track record.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: '—I mean, the funding from "that thing" you helped me with could easily last my research for over two years.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'As for this one—', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla points to the thing brought in by the Constructs.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "It's hard to describe in words. Let's just put on VR gear to experience it!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Oh, I also brought the full-body haptic feedback suit! You will need it, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: '——Babylonia Generic VR User Interface B.V.R.I. Version 1.14.3——'}
{3: 'Loading///'}
{3: 'Loading background sounds...'}
{2: 'Music', 3: '*Heavy, Aggressive Slavic Music*'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Hey! Whose music is this? I said don't leave it in the console!"}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Whatever, let's start again."}
{3: 'Loading file: Book of Toro...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory39.jpg'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'It is a dark, windy night. The leaves on the tree are making a rustling noise.'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'You are standing on a driveway, with your shadows slowly swaying in the moonlight.'}
{2: 'What is this...?', 3: '74', 4: 'I have a bad feeling about this...', 5: '98'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "...A virtual scene, maybe? But I'm not too sure where exactly this is...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Somehow this looks familiar to me...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'I\'m pretty sure there is a note on it saying "This record should not cause irreversible damage"...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'I would much prefer "will not"" than ""should not"...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Somehow this looks familiar to me...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: "The story begins to unfold as you can't help but look up to the other end of the driveway..."}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'Where another person appears in the moonlight just like you.'}
{3: 'A strange power is making you raise your head and look at the other side of the driveway.'}
{3: 'It does not feel like being manipulated or tempted. You just feel like it is the right thing to do.'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'It is a tall guy with a mask. He is holding a huge, chopper-like thing in his hand.'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'You begin to tremble—'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'Fear takes over your body. You realize it is impossible to win over this guy.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'You kidding? We can take on this guy with ease—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: "No, you can't. You need to run."}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "...Fine, if that's the game setting.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Kamui turns around and pushes you to run.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I think I know where this is... But before that, let's run!"}
